alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Putnam and southeastern Clay Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 412 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bostwick, or 8 miles north of Palatka, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Bostwick and Bardin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
